mapper.insert: insert into city.question(name, track_id, batch_id, contest_id, content) values (#{name}, #{track_id}, #{batch_id}, #{contest_id}, #{content})
mapper.update: update city.question set name = #{name}, track_id = #{track_id}, batch_id = #{batch_id}, contest_id = #{contest_id}, content = #{content} where id = #{id}
